item.description:
This event is cross-posted with Boston Live Music and Social Fun meetups.

Surely we Europhiles understand that the only thing missing from this Honk! meetup is Lederhosen.

Bands come from all over the US and the world to enliven Davis Square with bewitching music and costume. Come along and see if you can stand still.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qMybo-pvs_8

The bands will be playing for free between 1:00 and 9:00 PM in various locales in Davis Square.  http://honkfest.org/schedule

Please Introduce yourselves at Orleans, after this, the music will be loud. I change the start time to 3:30PM. We are meeting  in front of  Orleans 65 Holland St, Somerville, MA.  So at 4PM we can see the AfroBrazil group in Davis Square Plaza (Its near  where  Highland, Elm and Holland streets  all meet).   

AfroBrazil  has a special sound and energy inspired by Marcus’ hometown; Bahia, Brazil. A very upbeat + interactive show that you cannot miss! 12-piece percussion grooves like Samba and Axé with Funk, Rock, Jazz and Hip Hop.

I suggest we all try to wear the Meetup Red color to make it easier to spot our fellow members.  Please try be flexible.  The other band I am interested is seeing at  8PM is Emperor Norton on the Chester Street stage.  Afterwards we can TRY to hit the Burren before 9PM, to avoid paying a cover charge. If there is a charge we will go back to Orleans for drinks and stimulating conversations of what we enjoy this fine day!.

 

Please  note there are 7 stage which are all around Davis SQ, named as follows:

7 Hills Park

Statue Park

Winter Street

Davis Square Plaza

Chester Street

VFW Dilboy Hall

Kenney Park

This event has no rain date. The HONK! organizers tell me if it rains the bands will try & huddle in dry locations. Note: 50% change of rain as of noon Friday.

Public transport (strongly recommended) is the Red Line subway to Davis Square. It's $7 to park at Alewife, Quincy Adams and Braintree parking for the Redline.
item.how_to_find_us: Start time to 3:30PM. We are meeting in front of Orleans 65 Holland St, Somerville, MA. Look for Biagio!

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Sixth annual Honkfest Davis Sq. 2011---A FREE event
